data.name: Street Racing-OST
data.detailed_description:
Soundtrack of Street Racing.
Songs and Music from radiostation Russian Shanson in Street Racing (28 songs from radio, menu song and championship song):
1. Igor Korneluk - city which there is no
2. Michael Krug - Vladimir's central
3. Michael Boyarskiy - the green eyes' taxi
4. Michael Boyarskiy - the red horse
5. Valeriy Meladze - Sera
6. Gregory Leps - the Glass of vodka on the table
7. Valeriy Meladze - the Lady from highest society
8. Valeriy Meladze - hundred steps ago
9. Valeriy Meladze - ocean and three rivers
10. VIA Funny guys - the Automobils
11. VIA Funny guys - the diggers
12. VIA Funny guys - wandering artists
13. Yuriy Galcev - Uh ti! We out of the bay
14. VIA Funny guys - people are meeting
15. Igor Talkov - you're late
16. Valeriy Meladze - don't disturb My Soul , violin
17. Gregory Leps - The Best day
18. Valeriy Meladze - the small boat
19. Valeriy Meladze - it's beautiful
20. Vyacheslav Dobrinin - stream of music
21. Valeriy Meladze - in the middle of summer
22. Viktor Coy - the last hero
23. Viktor Coy - the group of blood
24. Viktor Coy - pack of cigarettes
25. Ivanushki international - clouds
26. Ivanushki international and factory - beyond the horizon
27. Igor Korneluk - you should.
28. Igor Korneluk - the ticket for the balet

and music from Menu and championship:
1. VIA bugs - driver (main menu)
2. Lyube - seven-string guitar (championship)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP,7,8,8.1,10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Storage: 158 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Storage: 158 MB available space
